scripts.wipe-save: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const file = path.resolve('apps/server', 'savegame.json'); if (fs.existsSync(file)) { fs.unlinkSync(file); console.log('✅ Savegame wiped.'); } else { console.log('ℹ️ No savegame found.'); }"
scripts.dev: npm run wipe-save && concurrently -n "client,server" -c "cyan,yellow" "npm run dev --workspace @xeno/client" "npm run dev --workspace @xeno/server"
